title: Just Cause They Are Girls
body: Just cause they are girls, everyone goes crazy in the game. I swear this vayne in my team was pulling some gosu shit when he found out that his support was a girl. 98% of the reason why we won is because my team was trying to impress the lady. I had my chat on mute so I didn't know what was going on until the end of the game. I was like no wonder my vayne went from 0/4 to 9/6 after the game. And my taric who was doing so badly went from 4/7 to 11/9 like bruh.

replies.body: I play with girls all the time, doesn't effect my performance or any of my friends.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=0fwO4idL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-21T17:23:06.044+0000)
>
> I play with girls all the time, doesn't effect my performance or any of my friends.

You sure they are girls.
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡° )
No, I couldn't possibly know the sex of a person I've known in real life for 6+ years.
legitimate argument, you don't know that persons gender!

Considering that gender is a derivative of sex, and is based on one's mental application and social appearance.
I do know their gender.
ahhh, but now you are lying, you directly stated before you didn't know their gender, tsk tsk, lying is a nasty habit.

No, I said I didn't know their sex while being sarcastic.

Sex=Gender.

Sex is your physical characteristics, while gender is your mental state.
Trans people have a different sex to their gender.

I know you're probably confused because of all the Tumblr BS that tries to act like they are the same thing, but they aren't.
I don't know if i could have made it more obvious that i was pulling your leg...
Well it's been painfully clear lately that practically no one on the boards have a clue what sarcasm is.
true that
It's hard to put across without body language
its put across with tone more than anything.
Yeah but body language is 70% of all communication. Tone is 25%. What you say verbally is only 5% of all communication.
sarcasm is usually noted from the tone in the voice though

shemaleeee jk jk <3

Have fun playing with her haha
Well thats how girls carry teammatea

At least you won BD
And honestly, getting that sort of attention in game isn't always great
Flattering I suppose, but it's strange that the male teammates got all flustered just because your support had female genitals :P 
Not to mention it's not like yall knew for sure
hahah. It's kinda weird.8
I am ahri, do I count as a grill
i just want that kitten...
One day a kitten will come to you :>
and I will be waiting to add it to my collection.
Yes
That's partially why in past I avoided conversation with other players. That sexual excitement/giddiness from boys when they suspect you're of the opposite sex scares the crap out of me.
^ This. I once trolled and pretended to be a girl and you won't believe how much friend request I had after the game XD
yea man i go from 0/8 to 19/8.
i go from 0/0 to 21/0
Hahahha
Can I have some of these guys on my team? Because I am a girl and I feel like 60% of the people I get are feeders. That's what I get for being bronze I guess?
Just say in chat "I'm a girl btw guys don't flame me". Swear to god you would be seeing the worst players turn into challenger players hahaha
Btw i'm bronze as well D: . So hard to climb tbh 3 afks in a row. Just play with a premade, if you don't have one just add me.

> [{quoted}](name=iAkeno,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=0fwO4idL,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-04-22T06:51:28.509+0000)
>
> Btw i'm bronze as well D: . So hard to climb tbh 3 afks in a row. Just play with a premade, if you don't have one just add me.

Yeah, I'll add ya. I'm thinking of making a "get out of bronze team".
Make a club instead of a team :D

> [{quoted}](name=iAkeno,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=0fwO4idL,comment-id=00040000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-23T09:35:49.262+0000)
>
> Make a club instead of a team :D

How?
Click on that button in between friends and notifications, click it and it should show "Create club"

Ik the feels, the "royal" attention seekers.
Same in real life really.

Tbh I don't blame the guys. Like only 6% of league of legends players are female. So any ladies out there, feel free to add me XD. It's so funny when you have a girl in the team, everyone does so well

I usually go from 0/8 to 6/9

If you know what I mean
did someone say 69 (  ͡°  ͜ʖ  ͡° )
